title: whats a maximum champion mastery you can get to?
body: started league not too long ago played warwick for many games till i got to level 4 just interested in whats the maximum mastery you can get to.

replies.body:
Once you get mastery 5, you can get mastery 6 tokens by getting S-, S, and S+ ranks. You exchange those tokens and either blue essence or a corresponding champ shard. Once you have level 6, you can get Mastery 7 tokens by getting S or S+ ranks.

Mastery 7 is currently the highest. Outside of that, its just mastery numbers like my 860k Illaoi and 200k Nautilus

Mastery 7 atm. You get mastery 5 by grinding points in games while mastery 6 and 7 require getting S- to S+ in your games depending on what mastery you're getting.
